title: Psychedelic Witchcraft - Black Magic Man (EP) 2015 320ak
description:
Psychedelic Witchcraft-Black Magic Man(EP)2015 320ak


PSYCHEDELIC WITCHCRAFT â€œBlack Magic Manâ€ EP

Rising from Florence, Italy like a Dark Arts practitioner on a broomstick it came calling, emerging from ethereal mist to tread the hallowed ground of musical lore. An audible tome of soul-eviscerating song selections that deeply delved into itsâ€™ listenerâ€™s souls and then kneaded said soul with emotional bewitchment and seduction. 
Of course I am referring to the six-song EP Black Magic Man released earlier this year by Psychedelic Witchcraft, the name now bestowed upon the collective creativity brought to life by the stunning enchantress Virginia Monti. 

If you are not hip to this release or the imminent full-length one soon arriving, The Vision, then you have happened upon the perfect band to learn of on this day, October 31st, 2015â€¦Halloween. Steeped in ages old occultism in itsâ€™ content, the EP is the ideal introduction to the increasingly more sought after vintage sound of a bygone era.  
 
TITLES: Black Magic Man (EP)4trks / Set Me Free (Single)2trks
   
YEAR : 2015

STYLE: Vintage Hard Rock, Heavy Occult Rock, Psychedelic Rock

Description

Players...?

I had help for the main guitar and the drums, bass was played by the guy that played the main guitar in the EP I played the guitar as well. 
It was cool they are good musicians they just played my songs did it right and it was it. 
I try to convince them to make the band with me but they didn't want to ... they said that my music was not interesting at all and they didn't want to play in a band that put Satan and Witches in their songs. 
So I said OK that's fine I will be alone.
Virginia Monti during interview.
